title: Were Home Depot Ceiling Fans Recalled after Blades Detached?
subtitle: The Home Depot and King of Fans, Inc. said that the recalled Hampton Bay ceiling fans have blades that "can detach from the fan while in use."
author: Jordan Liles
vclaim: Some Hampton Bay ceiling fans sold exclusively by Home Depot were recalled by King of Fans, Inc. after consumers reported that the fan blades had detached while in operation.
